title: Inran To Chuuken
description: Motoki, a police officer, has a troubled boss.  Awashima, his boss, can work in a career group, but he is willing to set up a honey trap for an investigation.  Motoki, who is a serious subordinate to the free-spirited Awashima, is just taking care of him while worrying.  At that point, Awashima pretended to be a customer and infiltrated the happening bar in order to suppress the evidence of the incident ...! ??
